comment: She is awesome and the topics are very interesting. Clear grading criteria, a few longer papers but no tests. Awesome professor
There are no tests for this course, only quizzes for each chapter and 3 short essays based on a question of your choosing. Take this professor for a guaranteed passing grade.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Thompson is so sweet and she really cares about helping you succeed. HIST 3100 is a difficult class because it has a big final paper, but Dr. Thompson wants every student to do well and really tries to help as much as she can. I'm taking her Women in US History course in the Fall. Absolutely love her and her lecture style.

Dr. Thompson is great, and I would definitely recommend taking her for this course. I took it as an online summer course. There are weekly readings/videos and worksheets, but they are pretty easy. There are 3 discussion papers and a final paper, but as long as you follow the rubric, they are easy. She made the class very interesting and enjoyable.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Thompson is an overall great teacher! She is very understanding, and she will give you extensions if needed. You get 2 free skips on assignments. The class itself is very engaging! Attendance is somewhat required since she randomly gives participation assignments. There were a few projects, but they were manageable. Definitely recommend!

Dr. Thompson was amazing! She has clear guidelines and responds to emails in a timely manner. She had two projects during the class and a few quizzes. I actually took her for Women's History 3341 and this was her first time teaching it she said. The content of the course was interesting so far this has been my favorite class.

Her teaching was very interesting, historically-based and mainly discussion based and movie watching in class. The class is quite feminine based but she is quite open to suggestions and changes, HW mainly consists of reading articles for discussion next class, and the lectures are very informative with comfortable/non-pressured discussion.
Probably one of the best teachers I've ever had, she makes learning history fun, I loved her class.

Professor Thompson was really amazing, the 2 exams we had, we were given a master key before hand. The quizzes were online and didnt need the textbook much either. Didnt go to class and attendance grade was still 100 (probably bc of covid). Ended with an easy A, take her if you can

Professor Thompson is great. She is an expert on Women's History so she definitely weaves a lot of that into her lectures, but nothing is s ever forced or pushes an agenda. Is a relatively easy grader. If you pay attention to the lectures and put in effort you will get an A.

Incredible professor. Lecture heavy, but easy to understand and easy to keep track of. She does have readings to do, but they're very easy and informative. Quizzes are online and her exams are easy to follow if you've studied the material. Definitely makes a hard class enjoyable.
She is so nice and understanding. She wants her students to do their best. She works with the class to ensure that people will do well in her style. She is my favorite teacher so far.

She's a good teacher that is very knowledgeable about history. She tries to do the best job she can for her students. My only complaint is that she teaches everything through a political bias. If you are a strong conservative, better to stay away. Class is kinda hard but you can get an A if you put effort into studying/reading and attend class.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Thompson is a real gem and honestly cares about her students. She was very open about the topics we discussed and honestly if you do her work you will pass with flying colors! She does take attendance! Show UP!

Dr Thompson is an amazing woman who is inspiringly dedicated to what she teaches. Everything she taught us was interesting, in depth, and thought provoking! From taking her class I am a much more open person and more considerate towards those who are part of LGBTQIA, and POC.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Amazing lectures

comment: If you get the opportunity to take Dr. Thompson DOT IT. She's an amazing professor, all of her classes are really interesting and she really cares about her students. If you do the reading you'll get an A. There is a lot of reading but she gives you a checklist for each week so it's easy to keep up with -not to mention the reading is interesting.

Professor Thompson is very sweet. I came to her near the middle of the semester and I had not done a lot of the modules. I explained my situation and she let me redo all of them. The class is very easy and she explains the content well even though it is an online class. 8 discussion boards, module quiz almost every week, midterm final.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: FANTASTIC teacher! She values everyone's opinions and loves when we get deep into discussion. She definitely takes a feminist approach to the course which is to be expected. My only problem is there is about 30 pages of reading due before every class and there are reading quizzes. She is also harsh with grading, but an A is possible.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: seriously the best teacher ever. she is so kind and truly cares about her students. she made history such a breeze and truly teaches the content. definitely take her!!! super sweet, clear grading criteria, and very respected

I personally really liked Professor Thompson. She was really nice. Attendance is not mandatory but you should attend class because that's when she gives out most of the lecture notes and that's what's on the test. The class is pretty easy if you go to class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Thompson is a seriously great teacher. Tests are lecture based so show up to class and take good notes; the tests aren't easy. There is also one paper due during the semester, and there is an opportunity to fix it which was great. Overall she is a passionate, respected teacher and she did a great job of making the class interesting and engaging
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Love her class! She says it like it is.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. T is great! The class is heavily based on lecture, so you need to go to class especially if you want an A. Her tests that are very reading and lecture specific, but if you write down and do everything she says you will definitely pass. There are 3 essays that you must turn in before the semester is over. Overall great professor!

Amazing professor! Her lectures have many details which make it easier to understand the topic. Attendance isn't mandatory but highly recommended if you want an A. Online quizzes are easy. Tests are ok too if you study. You are required to write a few essays by the end of the semester but it's not stressful at all! And be prepared to study a lot!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Thompson was such an amazing professor to have for this class. Her class is 95% lectures and has so many details in them that she uses on her tests and quizzes. Quizzes online and a few optional essays, very easy, lovely teacher.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--Amazing lectures

comment: Great Professor!! She was very good at lecturing and giving detail on discussions. She worked with us on tests and quizzes by making quizzes very easy with online access and study guides for midterms. Lots of studying for class but no unreasonable.

Dr. Thompson is a licensed historian, however, in her lectures she makes it clear for which political party she is for. Which causes for very slanted teaching. She posts power points with the topics she discusses but no content so you'll need to go to class. only good thing is her quizzes are online. if you want an A, don't take this class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
